books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other  joining the Resistance in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: A luxury car is found at the bottom of a ravine in New Hampshire, and the investigation of the accident leads to the discovery of a string of crimes.
books.name: CRASH AND BURN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: Jack Morgan, the head of an investigative firm, uncovers a murder ring in Las Vegas.
books.name: PRIVATE VEGAS

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Daunted by Christian’s dark secrets, Anastasia ends their relationship — but desire still dominates her every thought; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The three “Fifty Shades” novels in one bundle.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES TRILOGY

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Reunited, Anastasia and Christian face a world of possibilities, and unexpected challenges; the final volume in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Lisa Genova
books.description: A 50-year-old Harvard professor learns she has early-onset Alzheimer's disease; now a movie.
books.name: STILL ALICE

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: In the seventh book in the Beautiful series, Sara and Max face parenthood.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL BELOVED

books.author: by J. A. Huss
books.description: Two millionaires rescue a girl, and a relationship among the three of them evolves.
books.name: THREE, TWO, ONE (321)

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and litigates against the coal-mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN
